content: r11 2 single_crochet decrease 1 repeat around 18 st stuff body firmly adding lentils or rice if you wish to add more weight to this part r12 1 single_crochet decrease 1 repeat around 12 st add last bit of stuffing r13 skip 1 single_crochet 1 repeat 6 times fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing the head to the body weave in other end arm make 2 with red yarn make a magic_ring loop and crochet 4 stitches into it tighten the loop until it disappears r1 2 single_crochet into each single_crochet around 8 st r2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 12 st r3 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 16 st r4 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 20 st r5 3 single_crochet decrease 1 repeat around 16 st r6 2 single_crochet decrease 1 repeat around 12 st stuff the boxing glove r7 single_crochet decrease 1 repeat around 8 st r8 2 single_crochet decrease 1 repeat around 6 st change to white yarn r9 & 10 single_crochet 6 change to beige yarn r11-14 single_crochet 6 fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing i used the yarn tails to stuff the arm as it s pretty skinny you can draw other yarn scraps through the arm as well if you don t have enough from the hand it s also kind of gross with the long red and white strips poking out the end of the yarn like his limb was torn off by a zombie strong bad would have wanted it that way leg make 2 leaving a long tail for sewing with red yarn chain 6 stitches join into a circle on the first round r1-4 single_crochet 6 switch to black yarn r5-9 single_crochet 6 fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing stuff in the same way you stuffed the arm foot make 2 with white yarn make a magic_ring loop and crochet 6 stitches into it tighten the loop until it disappears r1 2 single_crochet into each single_crochet around 12 st r2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 18 st switch to red yarn r3 single_crochet 18 through back loop r4 single_crochet 18 r5 1 single_crochet decrease 1 repeat around 12 st stuff foot firmly again lentils might be a good choice if you want his feet to dangle down r6 single_crochet skip 1 repeat around fasten_off and weave in end lace-up panel chain 12 starting in second loop from hook single_crochet 11 fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing to the head finishing sew the head onto the body i had to do a few row of stitching to secure it as the head is so much bigger than the body…make sure it s not too floppy before you stop sewing sew the feet to the legs so that the boots point outward sew legs and arms onto the body sew the small lace-up panel to the back of the head and using black yarn
